ingredients: 1x 395g |14oz can sweetened condensed milk (or ready made Dulce De Leche/Nestle Caramel Top n Fill)
3 tablespoons granulated sugar mixed with 1 teaspoons ground cinnamon (or 3 tablespoons cinnamon sugar
3 tablespoons granulated sugar mixed with 1 teaspoons ground cinnamon (or 3 tablespoons cinnamon sugar
100g | 3.5oz dark chocolate, roughly chopped/broken into pieces (I use Lindt 70%)
